abstract: Defense Dept officials announce Pres Obama has authorized dispatching additional 600 US troops to Iraq to help Iraqi forces recapture city of Mosul from Islamic State group.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The deployment, to aid Iraqis in the looming battle to take back Mosul from the Islamic State, will bring the number of American troops in Iraq to 5,000.
snippet: The deployment, to aid Iraqis in the looming battle to take back Mosul from the Islamic State, will bring the number of American troops in Iraq to 5,000....

headline.main: U.S. to Send 600 More Troops to Iraq to Help Retake Mosul From ISIS
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Send More Troops to Iraq to Help Fight ISIS
